name: Atomik Innacurate Laserfights of Doom
description:
Atomik Innacurate Laserfights of Doom is a game made for the exhibition "Atomik Bazar" in Fribourg as part of the series "Atomik [...] of Doom".

The game portrays two to four space racers, eager to fight to be the first to conquer the moon.

Using only innacurate laser shots as well as small thrusters, try to defeat your friends before they defeat you!

Best played with 2 - 4 XBox 360 controllers. Left joystick to move and aim. "A" to jump "X" to shoot See table below when only using a keyboard.

Follow us on twitter: @SharpedStoneStd
